alert.note: Alert for Jackson; White; Woodruff (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued January 30 at 3:59AM CST until February 01 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 9 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...A couple of rounds of freezing rain and sleet are expected tonight through Tuesday night. Significant ice accruals over a quarter inch are possible. Sleet accumulations should be less than a tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Central into Northeast Arkansas. * WHEN...From noon today to 9 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are possible due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible in places.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. Be sure to check road conditions before traveling in these areas. Visit the Arkansas Department of Transportation`s website Idrivearkansas.com for the latest road and traffic conditions.
